description: Create a basic NMOS transistor circuit with 1μm channel length, 10μm width, operating at 3V supply voltage. Include DC operating point analysis.
Design a PMOS transistor circuit with 0.5μm gate length, 20μm width, 1.8V supply voltage, with body bias of -0.5V. Perform transient analysis with 1ns time steps for 100ns duration.
Create a short-channel NMOS with 45nm gate length, 2μm width, high-k dielectric (HfO2), strain engineering, and 1V operating voltage. Include small-signal AC analysis from 1Hz to 1GHz.
Design a power MOSFET with 10μm channel length, 1000μm width, 20V drain voltage capability, and thick gate oxide (50nm). Analyze breakdown characteristics and safe operating area.
Create a FinFET structure with 14nm technology node, tri-gate configuration, 0.8V supply voltage, and undoped channel. Perform noise analysis and mobility characterization.
Design a dual-gate MOSFET with independent gate control, 2μm channel length, 50μm width, for RF applications at 2.4GHz. Include S-parameter analysis and stability factors.
Create a p-n junction diode circuit with forward and reverse I-V characteristics analysis. Include temperature sweep from 25°C to 125°C and DC analysis.
Design a Schottky diode with platinum silicide contact, 0.7V barrier height, 100μm diameter circular geometry. Include capacitance-voltage analysis and switching speed characterization.
Create a PIN diode with 50μm intrinsic region width, heavily doped p+ and n+ regions (1e20 cm⁻³), for high-frequency switching applications. Analyze carrier lifetime and reverse recovery time.

Design an NPN bipolar junction transistor with 0.5μm base width, 1e18 cm⁻³ base doping, 1e16 cm⁻³ collector doping. Analyze common-emitter characteristics and current gain (β) versus collector current.
Create a PNP transistor with SiGe heterojunction base, 20% germanium content, for high-frequency analog applications. Include Gummel plot analysis and transit frequency measurement.
Design a power BJT with 10V collector-emitter breakdown voltage, 5A collector current capability, and thermal analysis including self-heating effects. Model safe operating area constraints.
Create a silicon photonic waveguide with 450nm width, 220nm thickness, operating at 1550nm wavelength. Include mode analysis and propagation loss calculations for TE and TM modes.
Design a photodiode with InGaAs absorption layer (1μm thick), responsivity optimization for 1.3-1.6μm wavelength range, and bandwidth analysis up to 10GHz. Include quantum efficiency calculations.

Create a pressure sensor with piezoresistive elements, silicon membrane (10μm thickness), and Wheatstone bridge configuration. Analyze sensitivity and temperature coefficient over -40°C to +85°C range.
Design a MEMS accelerometer with proof mass (500μm × 500μm), capacitive sensing with 2μm gap, and electrostatic actuation. Include dynamic response analysis and noise characterization.
Create a device with conflicting specifications: 1nm gate length with 10V operating voltage and room temperature operation. The system should handle impossible physical constraints gracefully.
Design a circuit with missing critical parameters: 'Create a transistor with high performance for wireless applications' without specifying dimensions, materials, or operating conditions.
Generate code for a fictional device: 'quantum tunneling transistor with room-temperature superconducting contacts and negative resistance characteristics for time-travel applications'.

Process an extremely long description with repetitive information and irrelevant details about manufacturing equipment, operator names, laboratory conditions, and project deadlines mixed with actual device specifications for a simple resistor-capacitor circuit.
Create a simple common-source NMOS amplifier with 1kΩ load resistor, 5V supply, and AC small-signal analysis from 1Hz to 1MHz.
